subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The Rangers, in need of an ace after Cliff Lee and C.J. Wilson left in free agency the last two years, signed Darvish to a six-year contract on Wednesday.
snippet: The Rangers, in need of an ace after Cliff Lee and C.J. Wilson left in free agency the last two years, signed Darvish to a six-year contract on Wednesday.
